summary: Full Stack Software Engineer with 4+ years of experience developing high-performance web applications using Python, Django, and Vue.js. details: GPA: 3.79, Top 4% of class.
Mastered data structures and algorithms, utilizing Python to engineer robust and efficient software solutions.

items.role: OwlBox AI | Full Stack Software Engineer
details: Led the development of an AI-driven video annotation platform using Vue.js and Vuex, enhancing user responsiveness and interface by 30%.
Engineered a scalable backend with Python and Django, implementing RESTful APIs and ensuring optimal performance and reliability.
Integrated Celery for asynchronous task management, improving task processing speed by 25%. Managed CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions for seamless AWS deployments.

items.role: Africa to Silicon Valley | Software Engineer
details: Developed HakimHub's frontend using Vue.js and TypeScript, facilitating real-time notifications and enhancing user engagement.

Coordinated with cross-functional teams to develop web applications across various platforms, managing testing and implementing software enhancements.
Developed and maintained web applications using Python, Django, and various Python libraries, focusing on code quality and maintainability.
Implemented testing frameworks and managed CI/CD pipelines, reducing bug rates by 15% and improving software quality.

Improved transaction processing speed by 20% and ensured system scalability to handle increasing user demands.
Developed a dynamic restaurant rating platform with Vue.js, improving user interaction and engagement.
Implemented backend services with Django, ensuring optimal performance and responsiveness of the application.
